name: Cookies on Top
description: A cold brew coffee customized for cookies and cream lovers. It features cold brew with vanilla syrup, vanilla sweet cream cold foam, and cookie crumble topping.

steps: Download and log in to the Starbucks App.
Ensure you are a Starbucks Rewards member.
Navigate to the 'Offers' or 'Secret Menu' tab.
Select 'Cookies on Top' to automatically add customizations to your order.
Order at participating stores.
howToOrder.notes: This drink was officially launched in the app on July 14, 2025.

name: Secret Menu Contest Winners
description: Starbucks is hosting a 'Secret Menu Contest' where customers and employees submit their custom drink ideas. Four finalist drinks will be featured in the app.

steps: Finalist drinks will be featured in the Starbucks App under the 'Offers' or 'Secret Menu' tab from August 18-25, 2025.
Users can vote for their favorite on Starbucks Instagram from August 18-20, 2025.
The grand prize winner's drink may receive further promotion or integration.
howToOrder.notes: Keep an eye on the official Starbucks App and social media for updates on these contest winners.

name: Butterbeer Frappuccino
description: Inspired by the Harry Potter series, this drink tastes like the famous Butterbeer. It's a sweet, creamy, and caramel-infused treat.

steps: Order a Vanilla Bean Frappuccino.
Add 3 pumps of Caramel Syrup.
Add 3 pumps of Toffee Nut Syrup.
Top with Caramel Drizzle (optional: line the cup with caramel drizzle).
howToOrder.notes: Always be polite and clear when explaining the customizations to your barista, as they won't know it by name.

name: Pink Drink (Remake/Variations)
description: While the Pink Drink is now official, many community-created variations exist. The original 'secret' version was a Strawberry Acai Refresher with Coconut Milk.

steps: Order a Strawberry Acai Refresher (no water).
Substitute water with Coconut Milk.
Add fresh strawberries or freeze-dried strawberries for extra flavor.
howToOrder.notes: Explore other variations online, as the community constantly creates new twists on this popular drink.

name: Rainbow Refresher
description: A visually stunning layered drink, often combining different Starbucks Refreshers or juices to create a rainbow effect.

steps: This is a complex layered drink. You'll need to specify each layer carefully.
Example: Start with a base of Strawberry Acai Refresher (no water, with ice).
Then, ask for a layer of Peach Juice (slowly poured over ice to create separation).
Follow with a layer of Mango Dragonfruit Refresher (again, slowly poured).
You might need multiple cups or a very patient barista.
howToOrder.notes: Be prepared to explain the layering process. It's best to order during non-peak hours.

name: TikTok Viral Drinks (General)
description: A broad category for any Starbucks custom drink that gains massive popularity on TikTok. These are often unique combinations of existing ingredients.

steps: Find the exact recipe (ingredients and ratios) from a TikTok video.
Write down or screenshot the recipe.
Politely tell your barista each ingredient and modification, step-by-step.
Example: 'Can I get a Venti Iced White Mocha, with sweet cream cold foam, and two pumps of caramel drizzle on top?'
howToOrder.notes: TikTok trends change rapidly. Always have the precise recipe ready, as baristas cannot keep up with all viral drinks by name.

name: Seasonal Secret Menu Hacks (General)
description: Custom drinks created by customers using Starbucks' limited-time seasonal syrups, sauces, or toppings.

howToOrder.method: Verbal Order (Customization based on Seasonal Items)
steps: Identify the current seasonal offerings (e.g., Pumpkin Spice, Peppermint, Toasted White Chocolate).
Think about how these can be combined with existing menu items or other secret menu bases.
Clearly articulate your desired base drink, seasonal additions, and any other modifications.
howToOrder.notes: These are often discovered and shared by the community as soon as new seasonal items drop.
